name: Tank Game (itch) (keeganjohn)
description:
The goal is to use your weapons to knock your opponents off the map. There is currently no AI in the game, so a 1 player game is a bit boring.

If you're interested in submitting your own tank idea, click here

HOLD the fire button to aim your gun, use the Gun Aiming buttons/joystick to aim, then release to fire.
If you find yourself stuck on your back, MASH the Fire button to right yourself.

If you choose to use keyboard controls:
Tank Movement: WASD
Gun Aiming: Arrow Keys
Gun Fire: Space Bar
Gimmick/Select: E
Cancel: R
Start/Pause: T

If you use a supported controller:
Tank Movement: Left Joystick
Gun Aiming: Right Joystick
Gun Fire: Right Trigger
Gimmick/Select: A
Cancel: B
Start/Pause: Start

***IMPORTANT***

For some reason, if you have multiple controllers of the same name plugged in when you start the game, it confuses unity. If you have this problem, unplug your controllers, and don't plug them in until AFTER the game has loaded.
